As part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a melee weapon attack against one creature within your reach, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and you begin to emanate a disturbing hum. If a hostile creature ends its turn within 5 feet of you before the start of your next turn, it takes [[/r 1d4]] sonic damage.

This power's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra [[/r 1d8]] sonic damage to the target, and the secondary damage increases by [[/r 1d4]]. Both damage rolls increase by [[/r 1d8]] and [[/r 1d4]], respectively, at 11th level and 17th level.
